goal: Understand the attribution impact of different marketing channels on customer conversions.
persona: A data analyst with 7 years of experience in digital marketing analytics, specializing in multi-touch attribution modeling. They have a keen interest in optimizing marketing channel performance and are focused on providing actionable insights that improve customer acquisition strategies. They possess a strong analytical mindset, with skills in data-driven decision-making and a passion for identifying high-value customer segments and regional behavior patterns.
